nodes.text: The Imperial Treasury Department was a governmental organization under the Ministry of Logistics that oversaw the treasury of the reconstituted Sith Empire. The Treasury Department also oversaw Imperial pay stations such as Pay Station RMH-1973, which was raided by the criminals Beryl Thorne and Risha Drayen. However, the heist went bad: Thorne was captured, and the Treasury Department issued a 1,000,000 bounty on "Risha Xanthous," an alias for Risha Drayen.
The Treasury Department was first mentioned in the Star Wars: The Old Republic Encyclopedia, a reference guide released in 2012 for the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
